about_text:
Hey! I‚Äôm Kacey, a full stack developer, artist, and all-around creative human currently based in Mexico. I‚Äôve always been fascinated by technology, but it wasn‚Äôt until I moved to Mexico that I finally had the space, time, and energy to really dive into coding.

I started by building free websites for local businesses and friends, and quickly realized that creating digital experiences is where my passion truly comes alive. Now, I freelance full-time, helping others bring their ideas to life through clean design and functional web apps.

When I‚Äôm not coding, you‚Äôll probably find me sketching in charcoal, experimenting with pastel and paint, or jamming out on an instrument. I play saxophone and trombone (though it‚Äôs been a while üòÖ), and lately I‚Äôve been learning to play drums ‚Äî because apparently, rhythm follows me everywhere. I‚Äôm also a language nerd, both human and computer. I‚Äôm fairly fluent in Spanish (getting better every day), and I love how coding languages and spoken languages both shape the way we think and connect with others.
